com.cinemamanager.dao

Class MovieDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cinemamanager.dao.MovieDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MovieDao

    public class MovieDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MovieDao
    JDBC implementation of the MovieDao interface.

    This class provides database operations for Movie entities using plain JDBC (Java Database Connectivity). It performs CRUD operations against a relational database table named movie.

    Expected schema (simplified): 

     CREATE TABLE movie (
   movie_id     INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
   title        VARCHAR(255),
   description  TEXT,
   genre        VARCHAR(100),
   language     VARCHAR(50),
   duration     INT,
   release_year INT
 );

    Note: This implementation does not use connection pooling or transactions. In a production system, those concerns should be handled at a higher layer or with frameworks like JPA/Hibernate or Spring JDBC.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Boban Vesin
